username.label: Username
username.hint: Your username will be unique and identify you across the app. It can't be changed later, but you can set a custom nickname any time.

email.label: Email
email.hint: Your email is only used to recover your account in case you forget your password. It won't be shown to anyone, and we will never send you unsolicited mail.

password.label: Password
password.hint: Choose a strong password, and don't reuse one from a different site. We highly recommend using a password manager.

display-name.label: Nickname
display-name.hint: The name that will be shown to other users. You can change this at any time from account settings.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

username.too-short: Username must be at least 3 characters long
username.too-long: Username must be at most 20 characters long
username.characters: Username may only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens

display-name.too-short: Nickname must be at least 3 characters long
display-name.too-long: Nickname must be at most 20 characters long

password.too-short: Password must be at least 8 characters long

errors.username-taken: This username is already in use
errors.email-taken: This email address is already in use
errors.register-failed: Something went wrong creating the user
